Description.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK representing a pharmaceutical product supply action (i.e. the dispensing of the requested product), and its current status (e.g. in progress, performed, abandoned).

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Supply subset with subset original id 1301000000132.

Description.p: The use of this subset is Mandatory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."Â
